document_data.caption: A map showing Thorndyke in eastern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Thorndyke
document_data.mainbody: '''Thorndyke''' was a small town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} and late 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Thorndyke was found in eastern Gwynneth north of the kingdom of [[Corwell]]. The town sat among the eastern foothills of the [[Cambro Mountains]] near the center of the mountain range.
